actions.text: Amendment SA 2626 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2626 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 48. Record Vote Number: 339.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 2626.

Amendment SA 2626 proposed by Senator Reed. (consideration: CR S13097-13101, S13125-13126; text: CR S13097) To impose a temporary windfall profits tax on crude oil and to use the proceeds of the tax collected to fund programs under the Low-Income Energy Assistance Act of 1981 through a trust fund.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2626 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 48. Record Vote Number: 339.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2626 proposed by Senator Reed.

purpose: To impose a temporary windfall profits tax on crude oil and to use the proceeds of the tax collected to fund programs under the Low-Income Energy Assistance Act of 1981 through a trust fund.
